career.name: University of Guelph - Intelligent Systems Lab
career.title: Graduate Research Assistant
description: Conducting preliminary research on development of Machine Learning (ML) system for optimizing integrated circuits (IC) projected to improve electrical performance and reliability.

career.name: University of Guelph - Advanced Manufacturing Lab
career.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant (Part-Time)
description: Developed and deployed a Machine Vision defect detection system for detecting embedded and process defects from painted automobile parts using deflectometry data with TensorFlow and OpenCV. Achieved 96% accuracy and reduced processing time by 40%.

Designed user-friendly interface that allowed seamless setup settings and displayed live defects found on industrial paint line and inspection line reducing bypassed defective parts by 35% and reducing inspection time by 75%.

Deployed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model within an industrial paint line, leading to annual cost savings of $3.5 million through enhanced quality control processes. Presented research at ISIME 2024.

career.name: University of Guelph - Advanced Manufacturing Lab
career.title: Lab Systems Administrator (Contract)
description: Configured and maintained a Debian Server with RAID to enhance data security and accessibility, supporting research operations. Developed custom tools for system monitoring using Python and Bash.
Optimized workstation configurations, integrating GPU acceleration and cooling systems, for 10+ researchers. Managed system security, reducing vulnerabilities, achieving zero security breaches.

career.name: Manouche Express Mediterranean Grill
career.title: Systems and Graphics Designer (Freelance)
description: Collaborated closely with a restaurant to design and update visually appealing menus, promotional materials, and event posters, enhancing marketing efforts.
Managed multiple design projects from concept through completion, working under tight deadlines to deliver creative solutions that met client needs.
